channel.title: Converting .rm (real media video) files to any other format?
channel.description: I'm trying to convert .rm (real media video files) to any other format at all preferably avi, mpg, or wmv. I googled for a long time and I couldn't find anything usable. All the programs out you either need to buy and the trial has really bad limitations or the download link was dead. The only thing I have that would work was my WinAviVideo converter. But it said I need the realmedia decoder and to download it from there site and it gave me the link but it didn't have it there. So any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Converting .rm (real media video) files to any other format?
item.dc:creator: @Dawn Dawn
item.description:
@Dawn wrote:

Well I had googled for a long time. Seriously do you think I would not of come across the number one result? Next time think.

Read full topic

item.title: Converting .rm (real media video) files to any other format?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Dawn:

You really think I haven’t? Jeez. I already tried that its too restricting.

Well, since you were so nice about the way you worded that response, you can spend a few more hours googling it.
